name: @jungvonmatt/contentful-ssg-project
description: A monorepo for all NPM packages related to contentful-ssg
author: Jung von Matt TECH GmbH

scripts.prepublishOnly: npm i && npm run build && npm run lint && npm run test
scripts.release: lerna version --no-private --conventional-commits --create-release github --yes && lerna publish from-git --yes
scripts.test:ci: npm run compile && npm run test:prod
scripts.test:prod: npm run lint && npm run test -- --coverage --no-cache
